about_the_game:
Experience the groundbreaking thrill of soccer (football) in virtual reality! No internet connection required.

Mount controller on your foot (or use hands) and step into the ultimate VR soccer experience! Soccer VR lets you dominate the pitch like never before. Play full matches against challenging AI opponents. Choose from three difficulty levels and a variety of formations to test your skills.

Master every aspect of the game. Hone your technique in dedicated practice modes, from penalties and free kicks to precision passing and powerful volleys. Face off against goalkeepers or take on target-based challenges to truly push your limits.

Unparalleled Comfort. Optimized movement mechanics minimize the potential for VR-induced discomfort. Adjustable difficulty allows you to tailor the pace to your preference, ensuring a smooth and immersive gameplay experience.

Freedom on the Field. Embrace a gameplay style that suits you. This simulation prioritizes enjoyment over rigid rules, empowering you to define your own soccer journey.

Prepare for Victory: Before entering the virtual field, we recommend familiarizing yourself with our comprehensive Tips & Tricks and Tutorial resources.

Embrace the Future of Soccer: Immerse yourself today!

DISCLAIMER
  • Yes, you can kick with your foot, just ensure you have enough space and follow tutorial in game
  • Game prioritizes enjoyment over rigid rules and we value user voice. You can suggest improvements in our Discord channel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD 400
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers - including Quest 1/2/3/Rift, HTC Vive, Pico 4, Neo 3, Varjo, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX series 20 / AMD Radeon RX series 6000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers - including Quest 1/2/3/Rift, HTC Vive, Pico 4, Neo 3, Varjo, Valve Index

short_description: Dive into the immersive world of VR soccer (football)! Experience the thrill of a full match with three difficulty levels and various formations. Refine your skills in dedicated practice modes, including penalties, free kicks, curved shots, cross finishing, and ball smashing.
